properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
ANTIGUA AND BARBUDA.
DNC 14.
24 FOOT F/V BELINA, BLUE AND WHITE HULL,
TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE VICINITY 17-00N 062-00W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
